attributes.description: Contact the Group 1 Sales team by filing in the form, we typically call you back within a few minutes. Look out for our call from the 27 600 number. We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices. One of our Sales consultants can come too you in the comfort of your own home or at your place of work so that you can view the car in a nonpressurized environment. We can arrange Nationwide delivery. All our cars undergo a Multipoint mechanical check to insure the best peace of mind. Become a part of the Group 1 Family today TsCs Apply. Call us on 021 903 0500

attributes.description:
The example is a 2013 Hyundai I20 1.4 Fluid. It’s an excellent partner to start of your career with, it’s reliable and light on fuel. Features include power steering, electric windows, multi-functioning steering wheel, air conditioning, climate control, radio/CD/USB/AUX input, rear park distance control and excellent boot space to put your luggage. This vehicle is worthy to be purchased no matter which way you looking at it. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
